Software.name: ProcessSpecPRR
Software.description: Software to process Oasis raw data to produce data from Biospherical PRR Spectroradiometers

Resource.name: processSpecPRR.log
Resource.description: Output log from the OasisCan software process

RecordVariable.name: time
RecordVariable.description: date and time as milliseconds since Java epoch

RecordVariable.name: oasis_time
RecordVariable.longName: Date and time in Oasis format
RecordVariable.description: Date/time as YYYYddd.ttttt, for year, day in year, fractional day
